mapper.insert: insert into purchase_tbl (no, purchase_date, order_no, category, company, detail, sum) values(null, #{purchase_date}, #{order_no}, #{category}, #{company}, #{detail}, #{sum} )
mapper.select: select order_no, sum, quantity, stock_in_date from purchase_tbl where no = #{no}
mapper.update: update purchase_tbl set sum=#{sum}, quantity=#{quantity}, stock_in_date=#{stock_in_date} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select order_no from purchase_tbl group by order_no
select sum(sum) as sum from purchase_tbl where order_no=#{order_no} and stock_in_date between #{date} and last_day(#{date})
SELECT COUNT(no) count FROM purchase_tbl where no > 0
select * from purchase_tbl where no > 0 order by no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
